definitions.definition: To entertain or occupy in a pleasant manner; to stir with pleasing emotions.
definitions.example: I watch these movies because they amuse me.

definitions.definition: To cause laughter or amusement; to be funny.
definitions.example: His jokes rarely fail to amuse.

definitions.definition: To keep in expectation; to beguile; to delude.
To occupy or engage the attention of; to lose in deep thought; to absorb; also, to distract; to bewilder.
